text:
MathWorks|Cloud Computing- Software Engineer|ONSITE| Natick, Massachusetts

Are you excited about working with containers, serverless computing, and orchestration tools? Do you have a passion for building scalable fault tolerance systems? If so, play a key role in designing, architecting, and developing MATLAB cloud services and cloud infrastructure. Collaborate in a fast pace Agile environment with a highly cross-functional team. Design and implement software and infrastructure to support worldwide internet scale. Interests/Qualifications: Kubernetes, Docker, Amazon Web Services, Linux, serverless computing such as AWS Lamda, Deep Learning, Big Data, and performance. You can apply here: https://www.mathworks.com/company/jobs/opportunities/17738?s... Interested in discussing further, email: matt.kaighn@mathworks.com
